layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x40
  LayoutBlockFlow {doc} at (0,0) size 800x40
    LayoutInline {p} at (0,0) size 698x19
      LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 698x19
        text run at (0,0) width 698: "The following text is in a caption element whose style is set to display:table-caption. The element is not inside a table."
    LayoutText {#text} at (698,0) size 4x19
      text run at (698,0) width 4: " "
    LayoutInline {captionelement} at (0,0) size 799x39
      LayoutText {#text} at (702,0) size 799x39
        text run at (702,0) width 97: "This is a caption"
        text run at (0,20) width 50: "element."
    LayoutText {#text} at (50,20) size 4x19
      text run at (50,20) width 4: " "
    LayoutInline {p} at (0,0) size 526x19
      LayoutText {#text} at (54,20) size 526x19
        text run at (54,20) width 526: "If there's no red text between this text and the previous text the caption is not displayed."
    LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 0x0
